long_description: She'll feel cool, stylish and athletic in the stretchy Columbia Bella Breeze Tunic for girls, with its moisture-wicking, quick-drying, sun-protective fabric. Stretchy polyester/elastane jersey gives her total freedom of movement in this tunic-length shirt. Omni-Wick(R) technology actively breathes and pulls sweat away from the body to dry fast. Omni-Shade(R) UPF 50+ sun protection. Columbia Bella Breeze Tunic for girls features gathered detailing at the hem.
short_description: She'll feel cool, stylish and athletic in the stretchy Columbia Bella Breeze Tunic for girls, with its moisture-wicking, quick-drying, sun-protective fabric.
